name: Letterkenny Institute of Technology
award: CERTIFICATE in Development Operations (Special Purpose Award)
desc: DevOps is characterised by operations staff harnessing the same techniques as developers for their systems work. Topics covered on this course included: DevOps Software Engineering, Process Management, and Object Orientated Programming for Server Adminstration. This course also included a 12 week long industry placement.

name: Letterkenny Institute of Technology
desc: This programme will provide students with the range of both theoretical and practical skills required for them to participate fully in the rapidly growing computing industry. The ethos of the course is to provide a strong core set of competencies in general computing. These skills are typically required across all companies working in IT.
